metadata.title: CVE-2016-1983 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The client_host function in parsers.c in Privoxy before 3.0.24 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read and crash) viaan empty HTTP Host header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1983` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.24-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.24-1').
